00025 #ifndef InputNb
00026 #define InputNb                 0
00027 enum    InputName               {  };
00028 int_T   InputsWidth[1] =        { -1  };
00029 int_T   DirectFeedThrough[1] =  {   1 };
00030 #endif
00031 
00032 #ifndef OutputNb
00033 #define OutputNb            0
00034 enum    OutputName          {  };
00035 int_T   OutputsWidth[1] =   { -1  };
00036 #endif
00037 
00038 #ifndef ParamNb
00039 #define ParamNb             0
00040 enum    OutputName          {  };
00041 int_T   OutputsWidth[1] =   { -1  };
00042 int_T   ParamsFixes[1] =    {  1  }; // 1 for "not tunable"
00043 #endif

00074 #ifndef MDL_INITIALIZE_SIZES
00075 #define MDL_INITIALIZE_SIZES
00076 static void mdlInitializeSizes(SimStruct *S)
00077 {
00078     ParamInit(S,ParamNb,ParamsWidth,ParamsFixes);
00079     InputInit(S,InputNb,InputsWidth,DirectFeedThrough);
00080     OutputInit(S,OutputNb,OutputsWidth);
00081     WorkVectorInit(S,WorkRVectorWidth,WorkIVectorWidth,WorkPVectorWidth);
00082     StateInit(S,ContStateWidth,DiscStateWidth);
00083     ssSetNumSampleTimes(S, 1);
00084 }
00085 #endif

00207 #ifndef MDL_CHECK_PARAMETERS
00208 #define MDL_CHECK_PARAMETERS
00209 static void mdlCheckParameters(SimStruct *S)
00210 {
00211     String C;
00212     for (int_T i=0;i<ParamNb;i++)
00213     {
00214         if ((ParamsWidth[i]==STRING_PARAM)||(ParamsWidth[i]==IDENTIFIER_PARAM)) 
00215         {
00216             // check if it is really a string 
00217             if (!mxIsChar(ssGetSFcnParam(S,i)))
00218             { 
00219                 sprintf(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER,"EasyLink error: Parameter port %i must be a string",i);
00220                 ssSetErrorStatus(S,ERROR_MSG_BUFFER);
00221                 return;
00222             }
00223             if (ParamsWidth[i]==IDENTIFIER_PARAM)
00224             { 
00225                 // check if it is really a identifier
00226                 ParamString(S,i,C);
00227                 if (!IsIdentificator(C))
00228                 {
00229                     sprintf(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER,"EasyLink error: Parameter port %i must be a valid identifer",i);
00230                     ssSetErrorStatus(S,ERROR_MSG_BUFFER);
00231                     return;
00232                 }
00233             }
00234         }
00235         else 
00236         {
00237             // check if it is a scalar or a vector
00238             if (mxIsSparse(ssGetSFcnParam(S,i))||
00239                 mxIsComplex(ssGetSFcnParam(S,i))||
00240                 !mxIsNumeric(ssGetSFcnParam(S,i)))
00241             { 
00242                 sprintf(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER,"EasyLink error: Parameter port %i must be a scalar or a vector",i);
00243                 ssSetErrorStatus(S,ERROR_MSG_BUFFER);
00244                 return;
00245             }
00246 
00247             // check the size
00248             if ((ParamsWidth[i]>=1)&&(mxGetNumberOfElements(ssGetSFcnParam(S,i))!=ParamsWidth[i]))
00249             {
00250                 sprintf(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER,"EasyLink error: Size of parameter port %i must be %i",i,ParamsWidth[i]);
00251                 ssSetErrorStatus(S,ERROR_MSG_BUFFER);
00252                 return;
00253             }
00254         }
00255     }
00256 }
00257 #endif
